presentation.name: I'm Cassiano,
presentation.mechanicalEng: Mechanical Engineer (graduated in 2017) at Facens - Faculdade de Engenharia de Sorocaba
presentation.aluraStudy: More than 350 hours of tech study at Alura.
presentation.storyText: Graduated as a mechanical engineer, I had a brief contact with programming during college, and that is how an interest and affinity arose. I am working on my career transition to front-end development, studying, developing and practicing on personal projects. At the moment, I am focusing on building applications with React and Typescript, but I am always interested in adding new technologies to my repertoire.

details.description: Simple web page that represents a marketplace. The products shown are static. The main feature is the good looking responsive mode.
REST API Marketplace, with a simple interface for the seller to add products. Access for fake login. email = 'fakelogin@alurageek.com.br'; senha = 'AluraGeek!@#'
A very simple and clean clean designed to-do-list, where you can crete a new task, cross it when it is done or delete.
